The CEO signed a brief message with RSA using a low exponent. Recover the plaintext from the signature: 0x34b4adef3accfaffab3f819400b3078c441b0eaea0f7880d705593d6ab366a63c70f3eb930523ff0742273c8489b25e1a1ba498e3f06824b51ae642dec40c843

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{1fxq6sfa}
ciphertext: 0x34b4adef3accfaffab3f819400b3078c441b0eaea0f7880d705593d6ab366a63c70f3eb930523ff0742273c8489b25e1a1ba498e3f06824b51ae642dec40c843
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (8715568041911234469973143162901220419217078350188475303244883685784115682048904282102396041530206868563919043329529450512078303237001500762710534726501689, 3)
